name: You Can't Go Up !
description:
A game made for the Mini Jam 87 : Break.

You control a character who has fled the war and is trying to find refuge in his grandfather's bunker, which is far below the surface.

The game has some roguelite elements like the procedurally generated cave and the random items you can find.

Share your score !

I made this game on Godot and did everything, except for the music and the sfx where my friend M.B. helped me.
